name: TeamSelection
0:
”Alexa, ask team selection to select random teams”
”choose random teams”
”choose even teams”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: team selection
des:
Team Selection skill uses list with football teams and their ratings in order to select 2 football teams that you can use to play football games.
Team Selection can select two totally random teams or teams with even ratings.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
